item.title: Tragedy of Commons
item.description: situation where people use a shared resource (such as land, water, air, etc.) without considering the impact on others or the future.

Bayes’ theorem Betteridge’s law of headlines Bradford’s law Campbell’s law Clarke’s three laws Cunningham is credited with the idea: “The best way to get the right answer on the Internet is not to ask a question; it’s to post the wrong answer.

item.title: Survivor Bias
item.description: Survivor Bias A bias where we [[cherry pick]]

item.title: Telomere
item.description: Region of DNA, at the end of chromosomes Becomes shorter every time a cell divides Helps ensure ends of chromosome don’t get frayed

item.title: Today I Learnt
item.description: A collection of useful things I’ve learnt, as I learn them. Some of these tips are life-saving, some are fun.
